name: lightlynx
description: Web app and extensions for Zigbee2MQTT to make it a polished integrated light automation solution.

scripts.build:debug: vite build --config vite.config.ts src/ --outDir ../build.frontend --assetsDir . --mode development --sourcemap --minify false
scripts.build: rm -rf build.frontend/* build.backend/* && npm run build:extension && npm run build:app && npm run build:cert
scripts.watch: npm run build:extension -- --watch & npm run build:app -- --watch
scripts.deploy:cert: npm run build:cert && dotenv -- bash -c 'node scripts/deploy-bunny-script.cjs $BUNNY_SSL_SCRIPT_ID $BUNNY_ACCESS_KEY build.backend/cert.js'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && dotenv -- bash -c 'rclone sync build.frontend/ :sftp,host=$DEPLOY_HOST,user=$DEPLOY_USER,pass=$DEPLOY_PASS_OBSCURED,key_use_agent=false:/ --progress --inplace --sftp-shell-type=none' && npm run deploy:cert && npm run purge-cache

author: Frank van Viegen
